Dichaetonecta Hutchison, 1940
: 354 ( type species:
Sigara scholtzi Fieber, 1860
, by original designation).

Species of
Dichaetonecta
occur in Africa, Madagascar , and Asia ( Hutchinson 1940 ). There is still no formal checklist of species for this subgenus as yet. In Vietnam , there are five species:
M. sahlbergi ( Jakovlev, 1881 )
,
M. ludibunda Breddin, 1905
,
M. johorensis Fernando, 1964
,
M. decorata Lundblad, 1933
, and
M. desertana Distant, 1920
.
